title: People are strange
body:
Just had a guy who decided to stay at the fountain the entire game and then in the after game lobby he gave people skins.

?????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

replies.body: Maybe they had connection problems and wanted to compensate their team mates?
Nope they were talking entire game, saying they're trolling and etc.
I need to meet this guy
Trading rating for skins. Like a boss.
